name: 10 Seconds To Recycle
description:
Every 10 seconds tons of garbage is produced worldwide! Your job is to get the most recyclable material out of it. Be quick and avoid to collect the non-usable waste! Maybe you can beat the highscore?

This minimalistic game is our fourth gamejam project (Ludum Dare 51 - Theme "Every 10 seconds") and we still need to learn a lot about game development, but we tried our best! (This time with only two team members.) We hope you like it as much as we do!

For the online leaderboard we are using dreamlo.com.
